translation.en: It's a monster! [thuds]
translation.vi: It's a monster![thuds]

translation.en: [Cleany] What? There's a monster living near the reservoir?
translation.vi: [Cleany] What? There's a monsterliving near the reservoir?

translation.en: You think, that you saw the unlucky wanderer?
translation.vi: You think, that you sawthe unlucky wanderer?

translation.en: Hm. There's a story that there used to be a figure like that in Toto Village.
translation.vi: Hm. There's a story that there used to bea figure like that in Toto Village.

translation.en: was anyone who met him would have lots of bad luck.
translation.vi: was anyone who met himwould have lots of bad luck.

translation.en: Like they've been cursed by a magician or something.
translation.vi: Like they've been cursedby a magician or something.

translation.en: Then, did the unlucky wanderer put some sort of evil curse on me?
translation.vi: Then, did the unlucky wandererput some sort of evil curse on me?

translation.en: Anyway, do you really think that something is wrong?
translation.vi: Anyway, do you really thinkthat something is wrong?

translation.en: He told us that the wanderer gives off a curse of terrible luck.
translation.vi: He told us that the wanderergives off a curse of terrible luck.

translation.en: Nothing bad has actually happened to Cap yet, has it?
translation.vi: Nothing bad has actually happenedto Cap yet, has it?

translation.en: No, but, what if bad things do start happening to Cap?
translation.vi: No, but, what if bad thingsdo start happening to Cap?

translation.en: It could be dangerous if it turns out that it's true.
translation.vi: It could be dangerousif it turns out that it's true.

translation.en: Helly, you can't just say anything you want about someone you don't know.
translation.vi: Helly, you can't just say anythingyou want about someone you don't know.

translation.en: Yeah, you're right about that. We should first meet this unknown friend
translation.vi: Yeah, you're right about that.We should first meet this unknown friend

translation.en: and then find out what kind of person he is.
translation.vi: and then find outwhat kind of person he is.

translation.en: According to Helly, he should be near here.
translation.vi: According to Helly,he should be near here.

translation.en: Huh? Poli that tent hasn't been there before.
translation.vi: Huh? Poli that tenthasn't been there before.

translation.en: -Let's take a look. -Let's.
translation.vi: -Let's take a look.-Let's.

translation.en: Who are you? I said, who are you? [both gasp]
translation.vi: Who are you? I said, who are you?[both gasp]

translation.en: [thumps] I don't believe you! Go away!
translation.vi: [thumps]I don't believe you! Go away!

translation.en: I'm... I'm sorry! [whimpers]
translation.vi: I'm... I'm sorry![whimpers]

translation.en: I don't think that he meant to hurt Poli at all.
translation.vi: I don't think that he meantto hurt Poli at all.

translation.en: I'll be sure to fix the damage in the morning, all right?
translation.vi: I'll be sure to fix the damagein the morning, all right?

translation.en: -Hm. -I wonder,
translation.vi: -Hm.-I wonder,

translation.en: should we just leave him out there like that?
translation.vi: should we just leave himout there like that?

translation.en: In fact, it seemed like he was pretty scared.
translation.vi: In fact,it seemed like he was pretty scared.

translation.en: [groans] What a mess.
translation.vi: [groans]What a mess.

translation.en: then he wouldn't have acted like that with you.
translation.vi: then he wouldn't have acted like thatwith you.

translation.en: What if he has a problem he can't tell anyone about?
translation.vi: What if he has a problemhe can't tell anyone about?

translation.en: The fact is, we might very well need to take a closer look at him.
translation.vi: The fact is, we might very wellneed to take a closer look at him.

translation.en: We should ask our friends who used to live in Toto Village.
translation.vi: We should ask our friendswho used to live in Toto Village.

translation.en: They might know something about this unlucky wanderer.
translation.vi: They might know somethingabout this unlucky wanderer.

translation.en: [Poli and Amber] We'll be back.
translation.vi: [Poli and Amber]We'll be back.

translation.en: [Posty] Cap, no matter how scared of the wanderer you are,
translation.vi: [Posty] Cap, no matter how scaredof the wanderer you are,

translation.en: you can't expect us to come with you every time you have to come this way.
translation.vi: you can't expect us to come with youevery time you have to come this way.

translation.en: It must be hard for Cap to feel this scared.
translation.vi: It must be hard for Capto feel this scared.

translation.en: Even if something does, it'll be up against four of us.
translation.vi: Even if something does,it'll be up against four of us.

translation.en: Well, anyway, I wonder what the Rescue Team is going to do.
translation.vi: Well, anyway, I wonderwhat the Rescue Team is going to do.

translation.en: -Do you think it's the curse? -[all] What?
translation.vi: -Do you think it's the curse?-[all] What?

translation.en: [groans] Wait, guys.
translation.vi: [groans]Wait, guys.

translation.en: [rattling] Uh, what's that sound I hear?
translation.vi: [rattling]Uh, what's that sound I hear?

translation.en: [whimpering] Get out of the way!
translation.vi: [whimpering]Get out of the way!

translation.en: -Get out of our town. -[all] Get out!
translation.vi: -Get out of our town.-[all] Get out!

translation.en: [gasps] I need to get by, so get out of my way.
translation.vi: [gasps]I need to get by, so get out of my way.

translation.en: [Jin] What? He got bullied by his friends because of his looks?
translation.vi: [Jin] What? He got bullied by his friendsbecause of his looks?

translation.en: Mm-hm. Tracky is his name. But because he has such big hands,
translation.vi: Mm-hm. Tracky is his name.But because he has such big hands,

translation.en: they made fun of him by calling him Monster Tracky.
translation.vi: they made fun of himby calling him Monster Tracky.

translation.en: Then, I guess he started wearing the cloth to cover himself
translation.vi: Then, I guess he started wearingthe cloth to cover himself

translation.en: And he probably lived like a loner until he ended up in our town.
translation.vi: And he probably lived like a loneruntil he ended up in our town.

translation.en: But, what about all these rumors that he causes bad luck.
translation.vi: But, what about all these rumorsthat he causes bad luck.

translation.en: His friends said they never actually saw anything bad happen around them.
translation.vi: His friends said they never actually sawanything bad happen around them.

translation.en: because of rumors, or because of the way they look.
translation.vi: because of rumors,or because of the way they look.

translation.en: [alarm ringing] [Jin] Huh?
translation.vi: [alarm ringing][Jin] Huh?

translation.en: Jin, you have to make the unlucky wanderer get out of town.
translation.vi: Jin, you have to makethe unlucky wanderer get out of town.

translation.en: The curse of the unlucky wanderer has started to work!
translation.vi: The curse of the unlucky wandererhas started to work!

translation.en: And we have just seen the unlucky wanderer, too.
translation.vi: And we have just seenthe unlucky wanderer, too.

translation.en: We'll find a way to settle this in a friendly way, so just hold on.
translation.vi: We'll find a way to settle thisin a friendly way, so just hold on.

translation.en: We really need to hurry and get this all cleared up.
translation.vi: We really need to hurryand get this all cleared up.

translation.en: Well, first, we'll have to get him to open up, which will be difficult
translation.vi: Well, first, we'll have to get himto open up, which will be difficult

translation.en: because his heart is frozen solid like a block of ice.
translation.vi: because his heart is frozen solidlike a block of ice.

translation.en: Then, how about this time we all go together to welcome him.
translation.vi: Then, how about this timewe all go together to welcome him.

translation.en: Great. If the whole team goes there, we can succeed in melting his heart.
translation.vi: Great. If the whole team goes there,we can succeed in melting his heart.

translation.en: [all chuckle] Good, let's go then.
translation.vi: [all chuckle]Good, let's go then.

translation.en: [crackles] Huh?
translation.vi: [crackles]Huh?

translation.en: What if he doesn't wanna talk to us, after we've come all this way.
translation.vi: What if he doesn't wanna talk to us,after we've come all this way.

translation.en: -[all] Huh? -[Helly] Where is that coming from?
translation.vi: -[all] Huh?-[Helly] Where is that coming from?

translation.en: [Helly] Oh, my! Tracky is holding up the breaking floodgate with his body.
translation.vi: [Helly] Oh, my! Tracky is holding upthe breaking floodgate with his body.

translation.en: Let's get over there. [siren blaring]
translation.vi: Let's get over there.[siren blaring]

translation.en: I'm with the Rescue Team. Help is coming, just hold on.
translation.vi: I'm with the Rescue Team.Help is coming, just hold on.

translation.en: All right. [grunts]
translation.vi: All right.[grunts]

translation.en: Amber, when we get there you need to stabilize the wall.
translation.vi: Amber, when we get thereyou need to stabilize the wall.

translation.en: [Poli] Roy, when Tracky moves, lock the hole with a boulder.
translation.vi: [Poli] Roy, when Tracky moves,lock the hole with a boulder.

translation.en: -Got it. -Got it.
translation.vi: -Got it.-Got it.

translation.en: We came out here looking for you because we want to become your friends.
translation.vi: We came out here looking for youbecause we want to become your friends.

translation.en: Yes. If you could just find a way to open your heart to us,
translation.vi: Yes. If you could just find a wayto open your heart to us,

translation.en: Not if they got the chance to actually get to know you.
translation.vi: Not if they got the chanceto actually get to know you.

translation.en: You just need to let everybody see the person that you really are.
translation.vi: You just need to let everybody seethe person that you really are.

translation.en: Tracky, if you aren't ready to come out, we can come back later.
translation.vi: Tracky, if you aren't ready to come out,we can come back later.

translation.en: He's finally coming out. [cheering]
translation.vi: He's finally coming out.[cheering]

translation.en: I thought you'd see my big hands and get all scared of me or something.
translation.vi: I thought you'd see my big handsand get all scared of me or something.

translation.en: We see they're nothing like the rumor said.
translation.vi: We see they're nothinglike the rumor said.

translation.en: Yes. We're sorry that we thought you are something that you're not.
translation.vi: Yes. We're sorry that we thoughtyou are something that you're not.

translation.en: It's just so nice that you guys all accept me now.
translation.vi: It's just so nice that you guysall accept me now.

translation.en: We're all really pleased that you opened up your heart to us.
translation.vi: We're all really pleasedthat you opened up your heart to us.

translation.en: Tracky, let me welcome you to our town, friend.
